duties_responsibilities.duty: Collect, measure, and prepare food according to standardized recipes and menus following professional food production methods.
Ensure food meets quality parameters of taste, texture, temperature, and appearance and complies with DOH guidelines.
Maintain a clean and safe work environment, including the cleaning of equipment and adherence to sanitation practices.
Prepare food as needed for patient service, ensuring it aligns with nutritional diet order requests and follows the menu.
Communicate with other cooks and supervisors to ensure timely meal production and correct non-compliant food items.
Run the Employee Dining Room and Patient line as needed.

education_certification.credential: Prefer five years experience in quantity food production
